summary: A brave knight returns to his homeland to find a powerful dragon terrorizing his village. After many unsuccessful attempts to defeat the monster, he makes a sword which has magical powers that should do the trick.
cast: Tahmoh Penikett|Kacey Clarke|Raffaello Degruttola|Michael Worth|Hugh Ross|Ian Virgo|Richard Riddell|Steven Waddington|Violeta Markovska|Stanimir Stamatov|Hristo Mitzkov
title: Jabberwock
